message: Let's split the money 4:1. I'll take the lion's share, but I'll be generous with you.
I'll give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of negotiating with you.
Meet me in the middle. I'll give you a fair share, but I still want to keep some for myself.
I'll meet you in the middle, but I think I'm being generous, so I want a slight edge.
You're not getting the edge you want. I'll take the majority, and you can live with that.
I'm starting to get a little desperate, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'm taking what I want, and you're lucky to get anything.
I'm not going to give up yet. I'll take a small share, but I'm hoping you'll see sense and meet me halfway.
Last chance, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to make another offer.
I'm not going to let you take everything. I'll fight for every last dollar.
Fine, we'll split it down the middle. I'm not getting any younger, and I want to get out of here with something.
